item.title: daily-task-status
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [module.set_array tasks_timeline] [after_submit raw] [query] [pagesize]100[/pagesize] [atts query_count=yes debug_dataset=no/] [with] [sql] SELECT coll_id as data_id, object_id FROM `plot` where coll_type = 'task_feedback' and meta_key='task_feedback_description' and date(stamp) = date('[env.get form_data.select_date /]') [/sql] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , GROUP_CONCAT(meta_value SEPARATOR '
  • ') as feedback from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.coll_id and coll_type = 'task_feedback' and meta_key='task_feedback_description' GROUP BY object_id order by stamp ASC [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , plot.object_id as story_id, meta_value as task_title from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].object_id = plot.coll_id and coll_type="task" AND meta_key="task_title" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as task_status from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].object_id = plot.coll_id and coll_type="task" AND meta_key="task_status" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as story_title from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].story_id = plot.object_id and coll_type="user_stories" AND meta_key="story_title" [/sql] [/add_field] [/with] [/query] [table] [column new label='User Story' meta_key='story_title' main_heading=yes/] [column new label='Task' meta_key='task_title'/] [column new label='Status'] [calc raw] [query.get_term_by field='slug' value='{row.task_status}' taxonomy='task_status' o.set='template.task_status'/] [template.get task_status.name m.capitalize=yes /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Comments' ] [calc raw]
    • [aw2.get row.feedback m.the_content=yes /]
    [/calc] [/column] [/table] [/after_submit] [handlers] [custom label='Show Task Status' module_slug='show-daily-status-table'][/custom] [csv filename='task-srarus-summary.csv' label='Download Report' pagesize='1000' ][/csv] [/handlers] [filters] [section period keys="select_date" /] [/filters] [/module.set_array] [env.set app.page_title="Daily Tasks Status Report - Plot" /]
    [plot.search-filter.main args="{module.tasks_timeline}" title='Daily Tasks Status' /]
    [/templates.add]

item.title: userwise-timespent-on-tasks
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [module.set_array tasks_timeline] [after_submit raw] [query] [pagesize]100[/pagesize] [atts query_count=no /] [with] [sql] select object_id as data_id, TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(cast(sum(meta_value) as int)), '%H:%i') as total_time_spent,updated_by from plot where coll_type='task_feedback' AND meta_key='time_spent' [if.not_whitespace form_data.to_date] and date(stamp) <= date('[env.get form_data.to_date /]') [/if.not_whitespace] [if.not_whitespace form_data.from_date] and date(stamp) >= date('[env.get form_data.from_date /]') [/if.not_whitespace] group by data_id , updated_by having total_time_spent > '00:00' [/sql] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , object_id as story_id from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.coll_id AND coll_type="task" AND meta_key="story_id" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as story_title from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].story_id = plot.object_id and coll_type="user_stories" AND meta_key="story_title" [/sql] [/add_field] [filter new not_empty={form_data.developers}] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* from plot join [module.previous_query_no /] on [module.previous_query_no /].data_id=plot.object_id where coll_type='task_feedback' AND meta_key='task_feedback_created_by' and meta_value in ([env.form_data.developers.comma.quote_comma /]) [/sql] [/filter] [/with] [transform ref_id=data_id /] [meta new] [table]plot[/table] [meta_keys]story_id, task_id, task_title, task_due_date, task_status,task_created_datetime,task_assigned_to[/meta_keys] [id_field]coll_id[/id_field] [/meta] [meta new] [sql raw] SELECT 'meta' AS type,data_id AS data_id,'story_title' AS meta_key,story_title AS meta_value FROM bounded_data [/sql] [/meta] [meta new] [sql raw] SELECT 'meta' AS type,data_id AS data_id,'total_time_spent' AS meta_key,total_time_spent AS meta_value FROM bounded_data [/sql] [/meta] [meta new] [sql raw] SELECT 'meta' AS type,data_id AS data_id,'updated_by' AS meta_key,updated_by AS meta_value FROM bounded_data [/sql] [/meta] [/query] [table] [column new label='Task'] [calc raw] [if.equal lhs='{form_data.submit_handler}' rhs='datatable'] [aw2.get row.task_title /] [/if.equal] [if.else] [aw2.get row.task_title /] [/if.else] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Task' cond='{form_data.submit_handler}' equal='csv'] [calc raw] [app.path /]/task/[aw2.get row.task_id /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='User story' ] [calc raw] [if.equal lhs='{form_data.submit_handler}' rhs='datatable'] [aw2.get row.story_title /] [/if.equal] [if.else] [aw2.get row.story_title /] [/if.else] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Assigned To'] [calc raw] [query.get_user_by field='email' value='{row.updated_by}' o.set='template.user' /] [template.get user.display_name /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Total Time Spent
(HH:MM)'] [calc raw] [aw2.get row.total_time_spent /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Status'] [calc raw] [aw2.get row.task_status /] [/calc] [/column] [/table] [/after_submit] [handlers] [datatable label='Show Tasks'][/datatable] [csv filename='task-worked-upon.csv' label='Download Report' pagesize='1000' ][/csv] [/handlers] [filters] [section period keys="from_date,to_date" /] [section filter keys="developers" /] [/filters] [/module.set_array] [env.set app.page_title="Userwise Time Spent on Tasks Report - Plot" /]
[plot.search-filter.main args="{module.tasks_timeline}" title='Userwise Time Spent on Tasks' /]
[/templates.add]

item.title: userwise-daywise-timespent-on-tasks
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [module.set_array tasks_timeline] [after_submit raw] [query] [pagesize]100[/pagesize] [atts query_count=no /] [with] [sql] select object_id as data_id, TIME_FORMAT(SEC_TO_TIME(cast(sum(meta_value) as int)), '%H:%i') as total_time_spent,updated_by, date(stamp) as activity_date from plot where coll_type='task_feedback' AND meta_key='time_spent' [if.not_whitespace form_data.to_date] and date(stamp) <= date('[env.get form_data.to_date /]') [/if.not_whitespace] [if.not_whitespace form_data.from_date] and date(stamp) >= date('[env.get form_data.from_date /]') [/if.not_whitespace] group by data_id , updated_by, activity_date having total_time_spent > '00:00' [/sql] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , object_id as story_id from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.coll_id AND coll_type="task" AND meta_key="story_id" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as task_title from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.coll_id AND coll_type="task" AND meta_key="task_title" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as task_status from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].data_id = plot.coll_id AND coll_type="task" AND meta_key="task_status" [/sql] [/add_field] [add_field new ] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* , meta_value as story_title from [module.previous_query_no /] LEFT JOIN plot ON [module.previous_query_no /].story_id = plot.object_id and coll_type="user_stories" AND meta_key="story_title" [/sql] [/add_field] [filter new not_empty={form_data.developers}] [sql raw] select [module.previous_query_no /].* from plot join [module.previous_query_no /] on [module.previous_query_no /].data_id=plot.object_id where coll_type='task_feedback' AND meta_key='task_feedback_created_by' and meta_value in ([env.form_data.developers.comma.quote_comma /]) [/sql] [/filter] [/with] [order] activity_date ASC [/order] [/query] [table] [column new label='Task'] [calc raw] [if.equal lhs='{form_data.submit_handler}' rhs='datatable'] [aw2.get row.task_title /] [/if.equal] [if.else] [aw2.get row.task_title /] [/if.else] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Task' cond='{form_data.submit_handler}' equal='csv'] [calc raw] [app.path /]/task/[aw2.get row.task_id /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='User story' ] [calc raw] [if.equal lhs='{form_data.submit_handler}' rhs='datatable'] [aw2.get row.story_title /] [/if.equal] [if.else] [aw2.get row.story_title /] [/if.else] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Assigned To'] [calc raw] [query.get_user_by field='email' value='{row.updated_by}' o.set='template.user' /] [template.get user.display_name /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Date'] [calc raw] [aw2.get row.activity_date date_format='jS M Y' /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Total Time Spent
(HH:MM)'] [calc raw] [aw2.get row.total_time_spent /] [/calc] [/column] [column new label='Status'] [calc raw] [aw2.get row.task_status /] [/calc] [/column] [/table] [/after_submit] [handlers] [datatable label='Show Tasks'][/datatable] [csv filename='daywise-task-worked-upon.csv' label='Download Report' pagesize='1000' ][/csv] [/handlers] [filters] [section period keys="from_date,to_date" /] [section filter keys="developers" /] [/filters] [/module.set_array] [env.set app.page_title="Daywise Time Spent on Tasks Report - Plot" /]
[plot.search-filter.main args="{module.tasks_timeline}" title='Daywise Time Spent on Tasks' /]
[/templates.add]

item.title: show-daily-status-table
item.dc:creator: wpoid_web
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main] [module.set table="{search.table}" /] [module.set query="{search.query}" /] [module.set column="{module.table.column}" /] [module.set query.pageno="{form_data.pageno}" default=1 /] [module.set query.query_count="yes" /] [db.meta_query query="{module.query}" set="module.dataset" /]
[if.yes module.query.debug_dataset] [module.dataset.dump/] [/if.yes]
[loop.@column module.column] [if.yes @column.item.main_heading] [module.set main_heading_key='{@column.item.meta_key}'/] [/if.yes] [if.else] [/if.else] [/loop.@column] [loop.@my_row module.dataset.rows] [aw2.get main=@my_row.item.{module.main_heading_key} o.set='module.xyz' /] [aw2.get @my_row.item o.set=module.datanewset.{module.xyz}.new /] [/loop.@my_row] [if.not_empty module.datanewset] [loop.@my_outergroup module.datanewset] [loop.@my_row @my_outergroup.item] [do.row] [loop.@i @my_row.item] [aw2.get @i.item set=row.{@i.key} /] [/loop.@i] [loop.@my_column module.column] [if.yes @my_column.item.main_heading] [/if.yes] [if.else] [/if.else] [/loop.@my_column] [/do.row] [/loop.@my_row] [/loop.@my_outergroup] [/if.not_empty] [if.else] [/if.else]
[aw2.get @column.item.label /]
[aw2.get main=@my_outergroup.item.0.{module.main_heading_key} /]
[aw2.get @my_row.item.{@my_column.item.meta_key} /] [code.run @my_column.item.calc /]
No status update.
[/templates.add]
